author: CTPPS
body:
CTPPS pixel clusterizer (input digis, output clusters)
New subpackage: RecoCTPPS/CTPPSPixelLocal.
Pixel ADC calibration called within the clusterization. CTPPSPixelGainCalibration record and tools added.
Mapping and dead/noisy channel mask to be loaded in the DB to have the raw2digi running properly.
Also contributors: @malbouis @clemencia @nogima
title: CTPPS pixel clusters with db
